sketchybarrc.content:
# Plugins
PLUGIN_DIR="$CONFIG_DIR/plugins"

# Tokens
source "$CONFIG_DIR/tokens/cha_colors.sh"
source "$CONFIG_DIR/tokens/colors.sh"

# Defaults
default=(
	icon.font="Apple Symbols"
	label.font="JetBrains Mono"
	icon.color=$COLOR_WHITE
	label.color=$COLOR_WHITE
)

sketchybar --default "${default[@]}"

# Bar Appearance
sketchybar --bar position=top height=56 color=$COLOR_TRANSPARENT

# Workspaces
workspaces=$(aerospace list-workspaces --all)
first_workspace=$(echo "$workspaces" | head -n 1)
last_workspace=$(echo "$workspaces" | tail -n 1)

sketchybar --add event aerospace_workspace_change

for sid in $workspaces; do
	sketchybar --add item space.$sid left \
		--subscribe space.$sid aerospace_workspace_change \
		--set space.$sid \
      background.color=$CHA_COLOR_BROWNRED1 \
      background.corner_radius=2 \
      background.height=20 \
      background.drawing=off \
      label.align=center \
      label.width=20 \
      label="$sid" \
      click_script="aerospace workspace $sid" \
      script="$CONFIG_DIR/plugins/aerospace.sh $sid"
done

sketchybar --set space.$first_workspace padding_left=2

sketchybar --set space.$last_workspace padding_right=2

sketchybar --add bracket spaces '/space\..*/' \
	--set spaces background.color=$CHA_COLOR_BG1_75 \
		background.corner_radius=4 \
		background.height=24 \
		background.border_width=1 \
		background.border_color=$CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3

# Clock
sketchybar --add item clock right \
	--set clock \
		background.color=$CHA_COLOR_BG1_75 \
		background.corner_radius=4 \
		background.height=24 \
		background.border_width=1 \
		background.border_color=$CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3 \
		label.padding_left=8 \
		label.padding_right=8 \
		update_freq=10 \
		script="$PLUGIN_DIR/clock.sh"

# Spacer 1
sketchybar --add item spacer_1 right \
  --set spacer_1 width=8

# Disk
sketchybar --add item disk.number right \
	--set disk.number \
    label.padding_right=8 \
		update_freq=10 \
		script="$PLUGIN_DIR/disk.sh"

sketchybar --add item disk.label right \
	--set disk.label \
		label="DISK:" \
		label.padding_left=8 \
    label.padding_right=4 \
		label.color=$CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3

sketchybar --add bracket disk disk.number disk.label \
	--set disk \
		background.color=$CHA_COLOR_BG1_75 \
		background.corner_radius=4 \
		background.height=24 \
		background.border_width=1 \
		background.border_color=$CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3 \
		padding_left=8

# Spacer 2
sketchybar --add item spacer_2 right \
  --set spacer_2 width=8

# RAM
sketchybar --add item ram.number right \
	--set ram.number \
    label.padding_right=8 \
		update_freq=2 \
		script="$PLUGIN_DIR/ram.sh"

sketchybar --add item ram.label right \
	--set ram.label \
		label="RAM:" \
		label.padding_left=8 \
    label.padding_right=4 \
		label.color=$CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3

sketchybar --add bracket ram ram.number ram.label \
	--set ram \
		background.color=$CHA_COLOR_BG1_75 \
		background.corner_radius=4 \
		background.height=24 \
		background.border_width=1 \
		background.border_color=$CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3 \
		padding_left=8

# Spacer 3
sketchybar --add item spacer_3 right \
  --set spacer_3 width=8

# CPU
sketchybar --add item cpu.number right \
	--set cpu.number \
    label.padding_right=8 \
		update_freq=2 \
		script="$PLUGIN_DIR/cpu.sh"

sketchybar --add item cpu.label right \
	--set cpu.label \
		label="CPU:" \
		label.padding_left=8 \
    label.padding_right=4 \
		label.color=$CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3

sketchybar --add bracket cpu cpu.number cpu.label \
	--set cpu \
		background.color=$CHA_COLOR_BG1_75 \
		background.corner_radius=4 \
		background.height=24 \
		background.border_width=1 \
		background.border_color=$CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3 \
		padding_left=8

# Force all scripts to run the first time (never do this in a script)
sketchybar --update

plugins/front_app.sh.content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

if [ "$SENDER" = "front_app_switched" ]; then
  sketchybar --set "$NAME" label="$INFO"
fi

plugins/ram.sh.content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# Get total physical memory in bytes
total_mem_bytes=$(sysctl -n hw.memsize)

# Get page size in bytes
page_size=$(sysctl -n vm.pagesize)

# Get relevant page counts using one awk command
read free_pages inactive_pages speculative_pages <<< $(vm_stat | awk \
    '/Pages free/ {free=$3} \
     /Pages inactive/ {inactive=$3} \
     /Pages speculative/ {speculative=$3} \
     END {print free, inactive, speculative}' | tr -d '.')

# Sum pages considered potentially "available" (Free + Inactive + Speculative)
non_active_pages=$((free_pages + inactive_pages + speculative_pages))

# Calculate non-active memory in bytes
non_active_mem_bytes=$((non_active_pages * page_size))

# Calculate used memory in bytes (Total - NonActive)
used_mem_bytes=$((total_mem_bytes - non_active_mem_bytes))

# Calculate used memory percentage
# Ensure we don't divide by zero or get negative results (edge cases)
if [ $total_mem_bytes -gt 0 ]; then
  used_mem_percentage=$((used_mem_bytes * 100 / total_mem_bytes))
  if [ $used_mem_percentage -lt 0 ]; then
    used_mem_percentage=0
  elif [ $used_mem_percentage -gt 100 ]; then
    used_mem_percentage=100 # Cap at 100 in case of calculation nuances
  fi
else
  used_mem_percentage=0
fi

sketchybar --set $NAME label="${used_mem_percentage}%"

plugins/disk.sh.content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

# Calculate usage percentage: (Total - Available) / Total * 100, rounded down
USAGE_PERCENTAGE=$(df -k / | awk 'NR==2{printf "%d%%", int(($2 - $4) / $2 * 100)}')

# Set the sketchybar label to the calculated percentage
sketchybar --set $NAME label="$USAGE_PERCENTAGE"

plugins/aerospace.sh.content:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

if [ "$1" = "$FOCUSED_WORKSPACE" ]; then
  sketchybar --set $NAME background.drawing=on
else
  sketchybar --set $NAME background.drawing=off
fi

tokens/cha_colors.sh.content:
# https://github.com/cha-theme/tokens/blob/61da886fe194297c198e850f3e4db5cdd254841a/sh/cha_colors.sh

# Background
export CHA_COLOR_BG1="0xFF222222" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BG1_75="0xBF222222" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BG1_50="0x80222222" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BG1_25="0x40222222" # 25% Alpha

export CHA_COLOR_BG2="0xFF1E1E1E" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BG2_75="0xBF1E1E1E" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BG2_50="0x801E1E1E" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BG2_25="0x401E1E1E" # 25% Alpha

# Brownred
export CHA_COLOR_BROWNRED1="0xFFBB7744" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWNRED1_75="0xBFBB7744" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWNRED1_50="0x80BB7744" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWNRED1_25="0x40BB7744" # 25% Alpha

export CHA_COLOR_BROWNRED2="0xFFB36D43" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWNRED2_75="0xBFB36D43" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWNRED2_50="0x80B36D43" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWNRED2_25="0x40B36D43" # 25% Alpha

# Brown
export CHA_COLOR_BROWN1="0xFF9B7E62" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWN1_75="0xBF9B7E62" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWN1_50="0x809B7E62" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWN1_25="0x409B7E62" # 25% Alpha

export CHA_COLOR_BROWN2="0xFFAE9164" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWN2_75="0xBFAE9164" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWN2_50="0x80AE9164" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_BROWN2_25="0x40AE9164" # 25% Alpha

# Green
export CHA_COLOR_GREEN1="0xFF8DA26C" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_GREEN1_75="0xBF8DA26C" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_GREEN1_50="0x808DA26C" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_GREEN1_25="0x408DA26C" # 25% Alpha

export CHA_COLOR_GREEN2="0xFF5F875F" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_GREEN2_75="0xBF5F875F" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_GREEN2_50="0x805F875F" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_GREEN2_25="0x405F875F" # 25% Alpha

# Yellow
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW1="0xFFD7C483" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW1_75="0xBFFFD7C483" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW1_50="0x80D7C483" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW1_25="0x40D7C483" # 25% Alpha

export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW2="0xFFD5B56B" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW2_75="0xBFFFD5B56B" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW2_50="0x80D5B56B" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW2_25="0x40D5B56B" # 25% Alpha

export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3="0xFFC9A554" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3_75="0xBFC9A554" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3_50="0x80C9A554" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW3_25="0x40C9A554" # 25% Alpha

export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW4="0xFFA38A45" # 100% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW4_75="0xBFA38A45" # 75% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW4_50="0x80A38A45" # 50% Alpha
export CHA_COLOR_YELLOW4_25="0x40A38A45" # 25% Alpha

tokens/colors.sh.content:
#!/usr/bin/env sh

# Using ARGB format (0xAARRGGBB)

export COLOR_WHITE="0xffffffff"
export COLOR_TRANSPARENT="0x00ffffff"
